meanings.definition: Inflammation of the vulva and vagina.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with vulvovaginitis after examining her symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Vulvovaginitis can cause discomfort and itching in the affected area.
meanings.sent3: The vulvovaginitis made her feel like she was sitting on a cactus.
meanings.sent4: Her vulvovaginitis was a storm raging within her body.
meanings.sent5: The redness and swelling of vulvovaginitis were impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by irritation and infection of the vulva and vagina.
meanings.sent1: The young girl's vulvovaginitis required treatment to alleviate her discomfort.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene can help prevent vulvovaginitis in women.
meanings.sent3: Her vulvovaginitis was like a pesky visitor that wouldn't leave.
meanings.sent4: The vulvovaginitis spread through her body like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The itching and burning sensation of vulvovaginitis was unbearable for her.
